name: Port Campbell Parkview Apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a 2 night stay here and the manager very helpful on checking in. 2 large electric BBQs for guests to use and on managers recommendation weren't to supermarket 15 minutes away for food. Port Campbell is very small with limited food opportunities.
reviews.title: Excellent clean facilities with friendly helpful staff
Good for a short stay
reviews.text: We had a simple queen studio but comfy bed, fridge, microwave and basic crockery/cutlery.
We saw all of the sites which were pointed out by manager.
reviews.title: Quiet, well appointed two bedroom disabled apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are now setting off for coastal drive to Sydney.
reviews.title: Convenient!

description: Port Campbell Parkview Motel & Apartments offers luxury accommodation at very affordable prices. We are located in a quieter part of Port Campbell, yet only a short walk to the beach and town centre. Our rooms are clean and comfortable. All linen provided and all rooms are fully serviced daily. We have a number of accommodation options available. One or two bedrooms large apartments, one or two bedroom family suites or our very popular motel suites. We can accommodate large families or travelling groups. Guests can choose apartments with full kitchen facilities, well equipped kitchenettes or extremely functional motel facilities.Our rooms are elegantly furnished and extremely comfortable. The double brick walls between units means that peace and quiet is assured. Temperature is controlled at your convenience by air-conditioning, and the luxury bedding may be warmed with out deluxe electric blankets. We have spa baths available in selected apartments, and for those less able, we have one or two bedroom fully compliant disabled access apartments to choose from. We have many TV channels on large TV screens. A large choice of free DVDs to borrow, and Free Internet to all rooms. Many of our guests take full advantage of our laundry facilities (including laundry powder) and friendly undercover barbecue area. Come along and enjoy our hospitality.
